  <h3><i class="fa fa-briefcase"></i> Experience</h3>

  <h4>Planet Archive Intern</h4>
  <p><strong>Office of Research, UCSB</strong> – Santa Barbara, CA (Jun 2024 – Jan 2025)<br>
  Developed a harvesting strategy and automated workflows to collect PlanetScope satellite imagery across California Natural Reserve sites.</p>

  <h4>Machine Learning Intern</h4>
  <p><strong>National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL)</strong> – Albany, OR (Jun 2023 – Aug 2023)<br>
  Designed ML models to predict thermal expansion in high-temperature alloys. Built training datasets and evaluated model performance across alloy systems.</p>

  <h4>Conservation Analysis Intern</h4>
  <p><strong>Conservation International</strong> – Santa Barbara, CA (Jun 2022 – Aug 2022)<br>
  Conducted cost-benefit analysis for tuna sustainability projects in Fiji. Mapped supply chains to inform strategic improvements.</p>

  <h4>Grants Officer</h4>
  <p><strong>Global Fund for Women</strong> – San Francisco, CA (Nov 2020 – Oct 2021)<br>
  Managed over 350 global grants, implemented Salesforce tools for communication, and streamlined data workflows for grantmaking.</p>
